_sText:
This Prefab will make you Green , but you can change that by changing the 2nd output. 

For Red you need to change it to :

With a parameter override of : 100 0 0

For BLUE you need to change it to :

With a parameter override of : 0 0 100

For BLACK you need to change it to :

WIth a parameter override of : 255 255 255

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you die you will still be in that color you set , but if you dont want that you just 
need to C&P the trigger to the Spawn and change again the 2nd output to:

With a parameter override of : 0 0 0

But when you are colored and than go to the spawn and touch this trigger you will again be 
Normal.

Make sure that this will be impossible
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I hope you understood what I wanted to explain^^

And if you need help ask me.
